mapper.update: UPDATE student SET studentState=0,studentDeleteTime=now() WHERE studentId=#{studentId};

UPDATE student SET classId=#{classId},paperId=#{paperId},studentName=#{studentName},studentGander=#{studentGander},studentNo=#{studentNo},studentMajor=#{studentMajor},studentGrader=#{studentGrader},studentNum=#{studentNum},studentMail=#{studentMail},studentPhone=#{studentPhone},roleId=#{roleId},studentState=#{studentState} WHERE studentId=#{studentId} AND studentState=1;
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM student WHERE studentId=#{studentId} AND studentState=1;
SELECT * FROM student WHERE studentId >= #{fromStudentId} AND studentId <= #{toStudentId} AND studentState=1;
SELECT * FROM student WHERE paperId LIKE CONCAT('%',#{paperId},',%');
SELECT * FROM student WHERE studentName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{studentName},'%') AND studentState=1;
SELECT * FROM student WHERE studentMail=#{studentMail} AND studentState=1;
SELECT * FROM student WHERE studentNo=#{studentNo} AND studentState=1;
SELECT * FROM student WHERE studentPhone=#{studentPhone} AND studentState=1;
SELECT studentMail FROM student WHERE studentState=1;
SELECT studentPhone FROM student WHERE studentState=1;
SELECT studentName FROM student WHERE studentState=1;
select r.roleName from student s,role r where s.roleId=r.id and s.studentMail=#{studentMail};
select p.permissionName from student s,role r,permission p where s.roleId=r.id and p.roleId=r.id and s.studentMail=#{studentMail};
